resources.string:
Temporary text courtesy of the newage bullshit generator.
This life is nothing short of a blossoming osmosis of joyous balance. Faith is a constant. Purpose is the driver of fulfillment. Our conversations with other beings have led to an unfolding of ultra-archetypal consciousness. How should you navigate this cosmic planet? Have you found your path? The world is calling to you via atomic ionization. Can you hear it? This life is nothing short of a blossoming osmosis of joyous balance. Faith is a constant. Purpose is the driver of fulfillment. Our conversations with other beings have led to an unfolding of ultra-archetypal consciousness. How should you navigate this cosmic planet? Have you found your path? The world is calling to you via atomic ionization. Can you hear it? The biosphere is approaching a tipping point. It is a sign of things to come. The rebirth of potential is now happening worldwide. Although you may not realize it, you are technological. Lifeform, look within and fulfill yourself. It can be difficult to know where to begin. It is time to take inseparability to the next level. This journey never ends. Imagine a redefining of what could be.
